hero.pill: Platform for creators, AI, and build teams
hero.title: Meblock aligns Content Creators, AI labs, and Software House excellence
hero.description: We orchestrate story, intelligence, and engineering so your next launch reaches market faster and lands with lasting impact.
highlights: Dedicated pods for creators, AI, and product delivery under one roof
Research-driven sprints turning ideas into pilots within weeks
Lifecycle support covering strategy, production, launch, and scale
hero.statNote: Meblock synchronises creative, AI, and engineering squads so your vision becomes real faster.

pillars.title: Three practice areas working as one team
pillars.description: Each pillar plugs into a shared operating system, letting ideas travel from strategy to production without friction.

items.title: Creator Studio
items.subtitle: Content that builds loyal audiences

points: Story architecture, editorial direction, and channel playbooks
Production crews for video, live, and interactive storytelling

items.title: Tech AI Lab
items.subtitle: Applied intelligence that ships
items.description: From research to deployment, our specialists design, prototype, and harden AI solutions tailored to your product vision.
points: Model evaluation, prompt systems, and data pipelines

items.title: Software House
items.subtitle: Full-stack squads ready to scale
items.description: We deliver cross-functional product teams that translate validated ideas into reliable, maintainable software fast.
points: UX, product, and engineering working within shared rituals
Modular architectures designed for growth and integration
Quality automation, observability, and secure releases

workflow.title: A shared rhythm for creators, scientists, and engineers
workflow.note: Every stage stays transparent through a single operating dashboard so stakeholders move in sync.

steps.title: Discover & Align
steps.description: Immersive strategy sessions translate business goals into shared hypotheses and success metrics.

steps.title: Measure & Evolve
